overview: Fifi is an actress in Napoleon-era France. She wins a lottery and leaves Cartouche, the man she loves to go live with a rich family. The conniving Louis Bourcet tries to woo her because he wants her money. But Fifi wants nothing to do with him, and ultimately she gives up her money and returns to Cartouche. But Cartouche, believing he is too old, refuses to marry her until Napoleon himself orders him to do it.
tagline: The Serio-Comic Tale of a Tiny French Actress. A Fitting "Follow Up" to Miss George Washington
title: The Fortunes of Fifi
